text.text: WHAT: ERB provides supporting materials for ERB activities in the form of Word documents and Excel spreadsheets. These contain instructions for carrying out activities, workshop facilitator guides, storytelling exercises, worksheets, key takeaways forms, and a reflection diary. You can edit, save, and download supporting materials.

WHY: Use them to plan and carry out ERB activities. As you fill them out, you generate information that can be used in later ERB sections and in your resilience plan. They also serve as a record of what you have done.

HOW: Access supporting materials in two ways. From ERB activity pages, look for the What you’ll need part of the page and click on the links next to the clipboard icon. From the Worksheet Index, click on the name of the supporting material you’re looking for.

A word document or excel spreadsheet will open. You can write directly in the these and they will save within the tool. Use the MyPortfolio tab to download selected supporting materials to your desktop and save them there. See the User Guide for detailed instructions.
